item.title: Nuclear stocks rally on report Trump will sign executive orders to support industry
item.description: The president is scheduled to sign orders in the Oval Office at 1 p.m. ET, according to the White House schedule.

item.title: Trump is asking Apple for the impossible, analyst says. Reshoring production won't happen during his term
item.description: Trump said in a social media post that Apple will have to pay a tariff of 25% or more for iPhones made outside the U.S.

item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Salesforce, Dollar General, Amazon, Microsoft and more
item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Trump getting Apple to produce iPhones in the U.S. is a 'fairy tale,' says Dan Ives
item.description: Still, the analyst maintained his outperform rating.

item.title: Tesla shares can rally more than 45% as 'golden age' nears, says Wedbush's Dan Ives
item.description: The analyst lifted his price target by $150.
